sign placed: The twin playing the game currently places a sign
attempted building: The twin playing the game currently attempts to build something
any ore mined: The twin playing the game currently mines any type of ore
drown: The twin playing the game currently drowns in water
greifing: The twin playing the game currently greifs someone's building
someone joins server: A collab partner joins the Minecraft server
hostile mob killed: The twin playing the game currently kills a hostile mob (Zombie, Creeper, Skeleton, Spider, etc)
passive mob killed: The twin playing the game currently kills a passive mob (Cow, Chicken, Pig, etc)
dies: The twin playing the game currently dies in-game
sleep: The twin playing the game currently sleeps in a bed
restart game: The game restarts (shown by the text and neuro head bouncing like a dvd screensaver)
crouch spam: The twin playing the game currently shows the universal peace sign (crouching rapidly)
mc movie reference: The twins reference the MC movie
POV :SCHIZO:: The twin playing the game currently rapidly shakes their POV in-game or looks at multiple things in a loop
